Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: RSP
Reviews.Content: Even though it was mentioned the phone is a unlocked one i was delivered a locked phone and had to follow up with HTC.the phone is good - no ear-piece is included.Battery is ok and drains out fast if you browse.Overall the phone is good but the seller is not as it claimed to send a unlocked phone.I rang up HTC and they say the warranty is from the manufactured date and now the i have to fax the bill etc.I feel the seller should take the responsibility and communicate the purchase date to HTC.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: marcoascencio
Reviews.Content: Excellent hardware. Of good performance, fast and easy to use interface. The weight plays a little against him.Apps varied and factory installed Windows Office.

Reviews.Title: Awesome htc phone... severe wifi issue
Reviews.Author: Ganesh Manivannan "Ganesh"
Reviews.Content: Recently bought this htc titan II windows phone. Was really excited about using this phone. Here are the features which I like the most. Very good camera, excellent battery life - 2 days time, excellent performace.MOST IMPORTANTLY, THIS PHONE HAS GOT SEVERE WI-FI ISSUE. WILL NOT CONNECT TO WIFI NETWORK IF YOU TRY SECOND TIME. DUE TO THIS, IT WILL CONNECT TO WIFI SUCCESSFULLY FIRST TIME ONLY. SEARCH IN GOOGLE. I AM TROUBLESHOOTING WITH HTC FOR THE PAST 2 MONTHS. NO SOLUTION TILL NOW. DON'T BUY IF YOU ARE MORE THAN 50% WIFI USER(MEANING: SWITCHING TO WIFI AT OFFICE, HOME, WHEREVER POSSIBLE). I CAME TO KNOW ABT THIS ISSUE ALMOST AFTER 3 MONTHS, WHEN I STOPPED MY 4G DATA PLAN FROM CARRIER. DUE TO THIS, I AM NOT ABLE TO USE IN HOSPITALS, HOME, OFFICE, HOTSPOTSPros:1. 16 MP Camera - takes really nice pictures with good sharpness, brightness and colors. Even at low lights,photos are good.2. Windows Phone - For the text in windows phone, Texts are so large so that you don't even need to strain yourself to read the messages, contacts, etc. Good to see contacts of gmail/hotmail, facebook. Its office app(word,excel,powerpoint) will make u easy to open files. Xbox integration is also superb.. light weight windows OS makes you feel like ur mobile is much free from background processes and feels like very fast irrespective of many apps installed.3. Battery Life: 1730 mAH. I use to browse internet for about max of 1 hr.. i may use wi-fi when at home, use cell data when out of home, 2 hrs of talk, 3-5 messages per day. With this, I am getting 2 days 2 hrs (almost 50 hrs of charge with 4% charge left)4. it is fast enough to respond while browsing with Internet Explorer.5. Dial pad is really big.. u can dial easy and faster.6. Wallpapers, text makes you a happy feel, that you have a very high resolution display.7. Touch is also much responsive.Cons:1. Eventhough dial pad is big, qwerty Keyboard is not utilizing the full width of the screen. keys in keyboard has slightly slim dimension which makes it slightly difficult for me(fat fingers) to type sms. Of about 40 characters typed, i may miss about 10 characters and retype. But I think, we can manage with third party app.

Reviews.Title: So far so good with HTC Titan 2
Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: First impressions are very good. Good 4G speeds and overall very easy to use. Nice big 4.7 inch screen. Great voice call quality and super loud speakerphone for conferencing. Can't wait to try out the 16 MegaPixel shots and high definition video recordings. Phone is updatable to version 7.8 which is the equivalent of Windows Phone 8.Fits very conveniently in small/medium sized hands and does not seem big at all. It is actually very thin compared to some of the newer phones and fits in pant pockets without feeling bulky.I was initially skeptical based on some negative comments on Amazon but I'm glad I bought HTC Titan II. This looks like a hidden gem; recommended buy before it runs out of stock!

Reviews.Title: Not Bad for a Windows Phone
Reviews.Author: Sarah Hornberger
Reviews.Content: This phone is mediocre by normal phone standards, but is okay for a Windows phone. I hate that I cannot hook it to a computer and add my music (cannot bring myself to pay exorbitant prices for music that I already own or cannot get through s***ty Zune). Live tiles and push notifications are the dumbest things ever invented. I cannot wait for my next contract renewal to go back to the Android operating system of my dreams.

Reviews.Title: A few problems
Reviews.Author: anatoliypo
Reviews.Content: I bought a HTC Titan X310a a few month earlier, and I liked it more then any of my previous phones.I've decided to upgrade to Titan II, because it has a better (16mp) camera.Now, I fill like it is a "down-grade". My Titan II often  gets frozen, I can't update it, and I can't send pictures or any audio files.I did't have any of this problems with my first Titan (mentioned at the beginning).I am looking for a solution to be able to send pictures (at least). Please let me know if any one knows how to fix it.I'm 100%  satisfied with my first Titan.

Reviews.Title: Poor Battery
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Compared to similar smart phones on today's market the battery life for this phone is very short.  Since the battery is embedded in the phone we even can not use a backup battery to be able to use the phone when it is needed most. Picture quality is very good and other functions are OK.

Reviews.Title: Great phone....with only one BIG downside!
Reviews.Author: Kelley Burke
Reviews.Content: I love my Titan II phone....the only problem I have with it is that the battery is imbedded into the phone and you CANNOT remove or replace it without sending it away to have it fixed by the manufacturer! When the phone overheats (which has happened to me twice...my fault...I used the wrong charger with it),it has an automatic safety feature that will shut down your phone completely and will not turn on AT ALL.  The only way to get it working again is to ship it back to the manufacturer to replace the battery.  The first time it happened, it took almost 3 weeks for me to get it back....I had to have a phone...so I bought a different one.  Now a perfectly good phone is sitting unused until I can afford to get it fixed.

Reviews.Title: I didnt want to rate this till i used it for a while.
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: It will Not Ever send or receive picture messages (mms) through t-mobile.There are multiple apps that any other phone can download and use that is unavailable (snapchat, pinterest, and anything else you might be able to send a picture with).The camera is amazing. Seriously good. It operates so fast and will take pictures as fast as you press the button (it has a real button, no screen touch bull)Batter life is so-so. You have to properly exit everything or it stays running and will very quickly drain your battery. Note* No app killers for this phone.I really like the flow of the windows opposed to the android software.It likes to restart. I don't know why. It is not because of updates.

Reviews.Title: junk phone
Reviews.Author: king leo
Reviews.Content: HTC has a habit of making gabbage phones. Oh Well, this phone is one of them. This phones freezes overtime. The screen doesn't switch back quickly when there is conference calls. Also, the battery drains easily than any other phones. It is a waste of product. please do not waste your money

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Jivie "Boo!"
Reviews.Content: Forget about iphone, this one is so good you won't think about it twice. I bought this for my husband and he loves it, so he pay according to the use.. which is very convenient for him.

Reviews.Title: It has all you need
Reviews.Author: Bharat V. Faldu
Reviews.Content: Its a work horse with word, excel and power point and outlook. All work likes you are on PC. Email tree work perfectly like you are on outlook. Especially prices under $350 you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: HC Titan ll redesign solved call quality issue with original Titan
Reviews.Author: wordworker
Reviews.Content: I loved the original Titan, but mine had the muffled call quality problem, so I had to part with it rather quickly. Tried the "patch" that worked for some - placing a tiny piece of electrical tape over the external mic on the top, but it didn't help much. Decided to take a chance on the redesigned Titan ll and I'm so glad I did. It's running Windows 7.5 (there are ways to force the 7.8 update), but it serves my purpose as is and I don't want to risk "bricking" it for the smaller tiles and additional theme colors. I'm a longtime Blackberry user and will probably get the new Q10 or Z10 when my contract's up, but the Windows Phone OS is such a pleasure to use. I like being able to "see" everything on the large display and the app selection meets all my needs (caveat: I'm more of a worker bee than a gamer). Good purchase!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: BryanIsaack
Reviews.Content: I totally love it! The screen is stunning, the size is not to big neither to short, its amazing! And the store was too!!

Reviews.Title: USED ANYONE?!!!
Reviews.Author: falicia
Reviews.Content: I PAID $183.00 FOR THIS ITEM AND WHEN I GOT IT, THE BOX LOOKED A YEAR OLD AND THE PROTECTIVE COVER HAD BEEN REMOVED AND RESET (BADLY) MAY I ADD.  THE CORD THAT WAS IN THE BOX WAS NOT NEW AND OUT OF THE PACKAGING.  THE PHONE WAS IN GOOD CONDITION, BUT NOT WHAT I PAID FOR!!!  THE BOX WAS UNWRPPED AND OPEN!!! WHAT THE HELL?!I WORK WITH THE US MILITARY IN AFGHANISTAN AND NEEDED THIS PHONE BEFORE I LEFT THE STATES.  I DID NOT WISH TO TAKE MY IPHONE AND STILL WANTED A GOOD PHONE, THIS WAS A SOLUTION TO THAT PROBLEM.  YOU FAILED AMAZON!!!  I HAD NO CHOICE BUT TO TAKE IT WITH ME OR HAVE NO PHONE!THIS SITE WILL NOT SHIP YOU THE NEW PHONE THAT YOU ORDERED, BUT A USED ONE IN A USED BOX!!!  GO SOMEPLACE ELSE FOR YOUR NEEDS!!!!

Reviews.Title: I liked it!
Reviews.Author: juan farias
Reviews.Content: I love my new Htc Titan II 4G phone. Having a new one after getting my older one broken out!

Reviews.Title: agradecido con mi htc titan II
Reviews.Author: ROCCO ANTONIO MATINELLA ROJAS
Reviews.Content: has a variety of applications is fast downloading programs compatible with windows phone.  your camera is 16 mgp good can personalisar all icons to your liking with topics such programs (wiztiles pro) accepts multiple applications and other

Reviews.Title: Wonderful phone
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: I get a new phone about every year because I just get tired of the one I have I don't see this happening this time this is a great phone with a lot of options

Reviews.Title: looks good
Reviews.Author: Fredric Sellers
Reviews.Content: Phone has a big display and is very clear and it fits in a medium to large hand easily.Set up is pretty simple and the phone runs smooth and is fast to respond to your touch,along with this it also seems to have a decent size battery and is pretty solid overall.

Reviews.Title: The phone in wrong
Reviews.Author: Rafael Chiramo
Reviews.Content: The phone buyd isn't ordered. that article is used and locked. I need to replace the phone, because is default

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: ekow baidenful
Reviews.Content: Its looks as described by seller,and also it got the best mobile operating system in the world,yeahh.Because it does not lag.Runs and superman in the air.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: cory kurtz
Reviews.Content: Great Product takes nice pictures and is fast and responsive. Had to bring it to the store to get it unlocked, now it works great.

Reviews.Title: Limited apps compared to Android or apple
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: good phone but very limited apps and playlist creation is not easy, complicated and confusing at best, unlike android or apple

Reviews.Title: Wrog item and charged for a the original one
Reviews.Author: gezim
Reviews.Content: I didn't receive the phone that I have ordered, instead I was sent a different one which is a cheaper one too approximately 60 dollars but they charged me for this one . I am very disappointed.I don't recommend any body to buy from this seller

Reviews.Title: my new toy
Reviews.Author: carolus
Reviews.Content: Woowoo.....I love my titan 2...fits my needs....phone arrived exactly as described and arrived on time....in addition to purchased two phone cases..

Reviews.Title: htc titan II
Reviews.Author: ryan waihape
Reviews.Content: phone is good overall but the 16mp camera was a bit of a let down a bit slow ive taken same quality photos with a 8mp camera but good overall would stick to andriod o/s next time aswell

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Steven Capers
Reviews.Content: works great. have problem with provider but the phone works great.  walmart family mobile isnt to friendly to windows phone...

Reviews.Title: NEED YOUR HELP
Reviews.Author: DORYS
Reviews.Content: time of connecting to the charger the phone would not load, showed no signs of working. No where is the problem but the phone is dead, and the seller does not want to apply the warranty is practically a steal of $ 300. I will not recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: nathan
Reviews.Content: i love it. its better then my old one thank you.i needed somthing new and that would work better then the old lol

Reviews.Title: Not that smart
Reviews.Author: moses
Reviews.Content: D maps direction doesn't give u where u can pick a public transport. U can't see d amount of GB u have used. U can't have temple run games or sky deck apps n days so so bad. The battery runs fast than what thy said about it. It will become junk phone after using it for sometime becos u can't replace it. And on top of it all USPS really sucks in delivery they always deliver 2 days late n they will u such things happens. Anyway I returned it for an android phone rather. I think android is better than windows

Reviews.Title: Product and Seller Review
Reviews.Author: Beauty&Brains;
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for about a year or so now and I destroyed mine (I'm kind of rough on them). It stood up very well. It takes amazing photos, has great wi-fi, good signal, everything. I bought a cheap replacement phone and now I'm about to buy this phone for the second time because I just can't find anything I really like more than this. It does freeze occassionally, but I'm a software update avoider, so that may just be because of me.UPDATE:I just received my "NEW" phone from J&B; Wholesale and am not at all satisfied. My phone did come unlocked, however it is obviously in no way new. It has been dropped and has light scratches on the screen and camera lense. The screws covered with void stickers (the ones that void the warranty) are scratched off, so guess what, no warranty here. The phone had dirt caked on a few of the edges and in the logo on the back, disgusting. The charger cord is covered in some white residue and the plug portion has been used as well. I'm deployed so I had to have the item forwarded and it's been too long and so much of a hassle I'm just stuck with it. I usually have great experiences with Amazon, but this particular purchase was a failure.

Reviews.Title: help me my phone is in English language and I need to pass it to Spanish
Reviews.Author: RENNY
Reviews.Content: good night I need you to please help me my phone htc titan came in English I need help to pass the menu in Spanish here in Venezuela do not know how to help me say it is the need to upgrade software and others say we need a code for Spanish go to help menu

16-megapixel rear camera Auto-focus with dual LED flash
16 GB internal memory and available SkyDrive cloud storage
